get.description: Retrieves a list of all gateways in the system

post.description: Creates a new gateway in the system

get.description: Returns details of a specific gateway

delete.description: Removes a gateway from the system

get.description: Returns a list of all rules for a gateway

post.description: Adds a new rule under a gateway

delete.description: Removes a rule from a gateway

get.description: Returns a list of all services for a gateway

post.description: Adds a new service under a gateway

get.description: Returns details of a specific service

delete.description: Removes a service from a gateway

get.description: Returns a list of all upstreams for a gateway

post.description: Adds a new upstream under a gateway

get.description: Returns details of a specific upstream

delete.description: Removes an upstream from a gateway

post.description: Generates a new API key for the specified gateway

get.description: Returns a list of all API keys for a gateway with obfuscated key values

200.description: List of API Keys with obfuscated keys

delete.description: Removes an API key. If the key is scoped to a gateway (GatewayType), provide ?subject_id=<gateway_uuid>.

put.description: Updates the set of allowed rule IDs (policies) for an API key
Replaces plugins matched by ID within the chain, preserving the original id and name.

post.description: Adds plugins to a gateway's required plugins or a rule's plugin chain.

400.description: Invalid request data or duplicate plugin for stage

delete.description: Deletes the specified plugins from a gateway's required plugins or a rule's plugin chain

get.description: Returns the current version of the AI-Gateway

interval.description: Time in seconds before resetting failure count

threshold.description: Number of failures before marking as unhealthy

id.description: ID of the gateway or rule this plugin belongs to

parallel.description: Whether this plugin can run in parallel

interval.description: Time in seconds before resetting failure count

threshold.description: Number of failures before marking as unhealthy
